style.strandArrow: function(f) {var type = f.get('type'); if (type.match(/signal/)) {return true;} return false;}

tracks.glyph: function(f) {var type = f.get('type'); if (type.match(/signal/)) {return 'JBrowse/View/FeatureGlyph/Diamond';} var strand = f.get('strand'); if (strand == -1) {return 'wormbase-glyphs/View/FeatureGlyph/LeftTriangle';} if (strand == 1) {return 'wormbase-glyphs/View/FeatureGlyph/RightTriangle';} return 'JBrowse/View/FeatureGlyph/Box';}
tracks.label: PolyA sites and signal sequences

metadata.shortInfo: High-confidence polyadenylation signal sequences and sites calculated by an algorithm trained with verified sites from full-length mRNAs. Signals are indicated with a diamond; sites with a triangle.
